entry.title: "Top 6 AS2 Software Solutions in 2024: Picks from 400+ Reviews"
entry.summary: In 2024, the world witnessed several significant developments in the technology sector. CDNetworks, a leading company, upgraded its WAAP solution by introducing the AI-Powered Cloud Security 2.0 Platform. This advancement aimed to enhance the security measures in the cloud environment. Additionally, Hikvision launched the second generation of its access control system, providing an improved access management experience. PlanSource, on the other hand, released its 2024 product, which focused on benefits engagement and artificial intelligence, bringing these aspects to the forefront. FalconX and TP ICAP collaborated to enhance liquidity and bridge the cryptoasset ecosystem, catering to the growing demand in the cryptocurrency market. Secureworks introduced the Threat Score, a groundbreaking cybersecurity AI that marked the beginning of a new era in cybersecurity. OpenX also made a significant announcement by introducing Programmatic's First Cookieless Deal Library, simplifying the transition to cookieless targeting for buyers. In the field of artificial intelligence, the Allen Institute for AI released OLMo, an open-source 7B and 1B models, contributing to the advancement of AI research. Lastly, VERSES brought natural computing to the center of AI discussions on the world stage at Davos 2024, highlighting the importance of incorporating natural elements into AI technologies. These developments showcased the continuous progress and innovation in the technology industry, shaping the world's future.
